name: Contact Form 7 OTP SMS Verification
author: allbulksms

sections.description:
SMS API: Buy Sms On All Bulk SMS

IMPORTANT: Abl OTP SMS Verification require wordpress 3.8 or higher.

Features

  • OTP Varification in Contact Form 7.
  • Support SMS gateways:
    • All Bulk SMS

Origin

sections.installation:
Abl OTP SMS Verification [Installation Guide]

  1. You can:
    • Upload the ‘abl-otp-sms-verification’ folder to ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory via FTP.
    • Upload the full ZIP file via Plugins -> Add New -> Upload on your WordPress Administration Panel.
    • Search Abl OTP SMS Verification in the search engine available on Plugins -> Add New and press Install Now button.
  2. Activate plugin through Plugins menu on WordPress Administration Panel.
  3. Ready, now you can enjoy it, and if you like it and find it useful.
